SELECT REVIEW_NO, RATING, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') REVIEW_DATE, CONTENT_ID, FIRST_IMAGE, MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, CONTENT_TYPE_ID FROM REVIEW LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, RATING, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') REVIEW_DATE, CONTENT_ID, FIRST_IMAGE, MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, CONTENT_TYPE_ID FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE I ON (R.REVIEW_NO = I.REVIEW_NO) WHERE REVIEW_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REVIEW_IMAGE_PATH IS NULL ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, RATING, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') REVIEW_DATE, CONTENT_ID, FIRST_IMAGE, MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, CONTENT_TYPE_ID FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE I ON (I.REVIEW_NO = R.REVIEW_NO) WHERE REVIEW_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REVIEW_IMAGE_PATH IS NOT NULL AND REVIEW_IMAGE_ORDER = 0 ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
